availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cynthiana, Kentucky, judge. Married to Catharine Dinsmore Broadwell in Harrison County, Kentucky, on October 18, 1852. Presiding judge of Harrison County Court in Harrison County in 1860. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Harrison, Cynthiana, p. 19.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Harrison, Cynthiana, p. 3-4.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000216896, Harrison County Marriages,.
Find A Grave, "Marquis ‘Marc’ Lafayette Broadwell (February 22, 1829-July 4, 1870,” Memorial #19079580, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19079580 (accessed June 4, 2017).
